content: this is an english pdf download not finished products tulip flower meaning it s symbolic of happiness love joy good luck and well wishes this makes it a well-rounded flower perfect for giving to a new love interest or on a first or second date as a sign of affection this flower can be used to match bouquets and a great match for flower bouquets they are perfect for home decoration wedding bouquets graduation flower bouquets birthday gifts or any holiday s day gifts the pattern includes -pdf files with detailed explanations and some pictures to help you along -level beginner -the pattern is available in english us terms terms of use the pattern and images contained in this document belong to yui from funincloud this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied，translated，resold，or otherwise redistributed in any way without the author s permission finished objects made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities as long as you credit funincloud as the original designer and use your own photos to represent your work purchase this pattern will be ready to download immediately after the payment you will see the download link in details of your order return policy instant download items don t accept returns exchanges or cancellations please contact us about any problems before you place your order if you find any difficulties in crocheting please feel free to contact us enjoy happiness with your crochet time
